name: Diksha Foundation

address: C-1, Shanti Vihar Colony, Ambedkar Path, Jagdeo Path

briefDescription: Diksha Foundation endeavours to create transformative learning spaces for children. To achieve this goal, we at Diksha strive to provide holistic education based on principals of economic inclusivity, socio-cultural rejuvenation and innovation that use both traditional and modern technologies.

address: B 4, Shama Vihar, Plot No 9, Sector 23, Dwarka
